assignment.title: Project: Design a Futuristic AI Solution
assignment.objective: Conceptualize and outline a futuristic AI solution for a real-world problem.
expectedCapabilities: Address ethical concerns in AI design
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a PDF document with flowcharts, problem analysis, and ethical considerations.

tasks.title: Conceptualize AI Solution
tasks.description: Prepare a document detailing the AI application concept, including potential benefits and challenges.

steps.title: Select a Real-World Problem
steps.description: Choose a problem from the provided list or propose your own with approval.

steps.title: Design an AI Framework
steps.description: Outline the architecture of your AI solution using flowcharts and diagrams.

steps.title: Evaluate Ethical Considerations
steps.description: Discuss potential ethical concerns related to your AI use case.

checkForUnderstanding.question: What is the first step in designing an AI solution?
Why are ethical considerations important in AI design?
options: To ensure social acceptance and responsibility
checkForUnderstanding.answer: To ensure social acceptance and responsibility

subsections.title: Overview of Current AI Applications
subsections.content: This subsection covers the current landscape of AI applications across various industries. AI is revolutionizing sectors such as healthcare with predictive diagnostics, finance with algorithmic trading, and transportation with autonomous vehicles. Each application has unique models tailored to solve specific problems efficiently.

quizzes.question: Which industry is utilizing AI for predictive diagnostics?

subsections.title: Emerging AI Technologies
subsections.content: A dive into emerging AI technologies such as Quantum Computing in AI, Neuromorphic Computing, and Adaptive AI Systems. These technologies are set to redefine computational limits and efficiency, accelerating AI processing capabilities.

quizzes.question: What is Neuromorphic Computing inspired by?

subsections.title: Building Scalable AI Systems
subsections.content: Learn the architectural considerations for designing scalable AI systems that grow with data and computational needs. Topics include data pipeline architecture, scalability in AI model training, and distributed computation using frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
codeExamples:
import tensorflow as tf
model = tf.keras.models.Sequential([tf.keras.layers.Dense(units=128, activation='relu', input_shape=(input_shape,))])

quizzes.question: Which framework is commonly used for distributed AI computation?

subsections.title: Identifying Real-World Problems Solvable by AI
subsections.content: Engage in identifying and analyzing real-world problems that could potentially benefit from AI-driven solutions. Critical thinking is necessary to evaluate which problems present feasible challenges for AI technologies considering ethical and practical aspects.

quizzes.question: What should be considered when identifying AI-solvable problems?
